safari.heroDescription: Thola ukulinganisela okuphelele kokunethezeka ne-adventure. Lemu eliyi-12 m² canvas imiswe endaweni enkulu engu-3×6 m, inezindonga eziyisembozo ezingasemaceleni nangasemumva—ikunikeza ubumfihlo nendawo yokukhosela ngenkathi useduzane nemvelo.

sections.heading: Isikhala & Ukuhlelwa
sections.description: Ithende linezinto ezihleliwe kahle, ezinomoya omnene nezinto ezicatshangelwe ukwenza impilo ibe lula.
features: Inethi lokuvimba omiyane kuwo wonke amawindi neminyango

sections.heading: Ukulala & Ukunethezeka
sections.description: Amabheda amabili abodwa anezisekelo nezibani ezinomthunzi angahlanganiswa abe yibheda elikhulu le-King-size ezivakashini ezikhetha ukulala ndawonye.
features: Ama-matrass esiqu phezulu nezibani zaseceleni kwebhedi
Ifeni enamandla ebusika nobusuku obupholile basehlobo

sections.heading: Itherrasi & Ingadi
sections.description: Nyuka i-therrasi yakho yangasese, egcwele izitulo ezigingqiwe zamaqabunga esundu. Njabulise ngokubukwa kwengadi ehlotyene yetroppiki—ekhanyiswe kahle ebusuku ngomoya othandekayo.

sections.heading: Amagumbi okugezela
sections.description: Izivakashi ziyakwazi ukusebenzisa amagumbi okugezela okwabiwe, ahlukene abesifazane nabesilisa—agcinwa ahlanzekile futhi alula ukusetshenziswa.
features: Ama-2× ashawa amanzi ashisayo/abandayo ohlangothini ngalunye

sections.heading: Kuhle Ukwazi
sections.description: Ngezimpelasonto zamaholide omphakathi kanye nesikhathi esivamile (ukuphela kukaZibandlela–ekuqaleni kukaJanuwari), umuzi ungaba nomoya. Ama-earplugs amahhala ayatholakala emahholweni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukulala okuzolile ebusuku.
sections.closingNote: Indawo yokuhlala enenke, egcwele imvelo enezinto zokunethezeka zesimanje—ifanele isafutha esifuna ukukhona ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa yilula.

cta.heading: Ukulungele Ukubhuka Ithende Yakho Yesafari?
cta.description: Qinisekisa ukubalekela kwakho okugcwele imvelo e-DEVOCEAN Lodge. Ukubhuka ngokuqondile kusho amanani angcono kakhulu nokwesekwa okuphelele okuvela eqenjini lethu.

comfort.heroTitle: Ubumfihlo obuningi. Ukunethezeka okuningi. Ubuhle obufanayo bendawo yasendle.
comfort.heroDescription: Ezivakashini ezithanda umoya wokugcwala imvelo kodwa ezifuna ukuzihlukanisa ngokwengeziwe nolula, i-Comfort Safari Tent iyathuthukiswa kwinjongo yethu yejwayelekile.

sections.heading: Isikhala & Ubumfihlo
sections.description: Ithende elikhulu le-canvas eliyi-12 m² elimiswe endaweni yalo, linezindonga ezimbili ezingasemaceleni nodonga lwangasemumva ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuzihlukanisa uma kuqhathaniswa ne-Thende Yesafari Ejwayelekile.
features: Ubumfihlo obengeziwe: izindonga ezi-2 ezingasemaceleni + udonga lwangasemumva
Inethi lokuvimba omiyane kuwo wonke amawindi neminyango

sections.heading: Ukulala & Ukunethezeka
sections.description: Amabheda amabili abodwa anezisekelo nezibani ezinomthunzi angahlanganiswa abe yibheda elikhulu le-King-size. Ukukhanya kungalawulwa kalula ngoswayidi oseduzane nomnyango.
features: Ifeni elinamandla ebusika nobusuku obupholile basehlobo

sections.heading: Itherrasi & Ingadi
sections.description: Njabulise nge-therrasi yakho yokhuni eyimfihlo egcwele izitulo ezigingqiwe zamaqabunga esundu, ubheke ingadi ehlotyene yetroppiki—ekhanyiswe ngothando ebusuku.

sections.heading: Igumbi Lokugezela Elingasese
sections.description: Ngasemumva kwethende, ngaphansi kophahla olukhanga lwotshani, igumbi lakho lokugezela elihlanganiswe nendlu linama-shower, indlu yangasese, ne-sink—kuhlanganisa ulula nomoya owodwa wangaphandle.

sections.heading: Kuhle Ukwazi
sections.description: Nakuba i-DEVOCEAN Lodge inokuthula, umuzi ozungezile ungaba nomoya ngezimpelasonto zamaholide omphakathi kanye nesikhathi esivamile (ukuphela kukaZibandlela–ekuqaleni kukaJanuwari). Ama-earplugs amahhala ayatholakala emahholweni.
sections.closingNote: Indawo yokuhlala enenke, ehleliwe kahle, neyimfihlo yesitayela sesafari—ifanele izivakashi ezifuna ukunethezeka, ukuzihlukanisa, nolula lwegumbi lokugezela elihlanganiswe nendlu.

cta.heading: Ukulungele Ukubhuka Ithende Yakho Lokunethezeka?
cta.description: Thuthukisa ukubalekela kwakho kwemvelo ngobumfihlo obuthuthukisiwe nolula lwegumbi lokugezela elihlanganiswe nendlu. Bhuka ngokuqondile ngamanani angcono kakhulu.

cottage.heroTitle: Ubuhle bendawo • Ukuthula kwe-tropical • Ukunethezeka kwesimanje
cottage.heroDescription: Igxile engadini yethu ehlotyene yetroppiki, i-Garden Cottage ihlanganisa ubuhle bendawo nokunethezeka kwekhaya. Uphahla obomvu lwama-Roman tile nophahla oluphezulu olumhlophe olunemishayo yokhuni omnyama kudala indawo yokuhlala enenke, enomoya ngesimilo.

sections.heading: Umoya & Idizayini
sections.description: Ithebula le-terracotta tile linezela ukufudumala ngaphansi kophahla oluphezulu olunomugqa wemishayo, kuyilapho izindonga ezifakiwe udayi lwe-wheatfield zithuthukisa umoya we-cottage onokuthula nokhethwa.

sections.heading: Itherrasi & Ingadi
sections.description: Phuma i-therrassi yakho yokhuni eyimfihlo, egcwele izitulo zokukhempa netafula leceleni — indawo enokuthula yokuzola nokuthatha imvelo ehlotyene nomoya omnene wengadi.

sections.heading: Ingaphakathi & Izinto Zokwenza
sections.description: Klanyelwe ukuzola nokusebenza, i-Garden Cottage inebhedi le-Queen-size elibhokisiwe, ideski elisebenzayo elinesibani esinomthunzi, netafula lokudlela ngezitulo.
features: Isitoreji: amashelufu esutukhesi, ireyiki yezingubo, ishelufu eyengeziwe

sections.heading: Ukunethezeka & Ukukhanya
sections.description: I-air conditioner ye-inverter ikugcina ukunethezeka kuzo zonke izinkathi, inikeza ukuphola nokufudumala. Ukukhanya okumnene, kufaka isibani esiyinhloko esingaguqulwa, kukuvumela ukusetha umoya ophelele womsebenzi, ukuphumula, noma ukuzola.

sections.heading: Igumbi Lokugezela Elingasese
sections.description: Ngasemumva kwe-cottage, indlu eyindilinga ekhangayo yotshani igcwele igumbi lakho lokugezela elizimele, eligcwele i-shower, indlu yangasese, ne-sink—kuhlanganisa ulula lwesimanje nomoya we-Afrika wangempela.

cta.heading: Ukulungele Ukubhuka Indlu Yakho Encane Yengadi?
cta.description: Thola ubuhle bendawo endaweni yethu yokuhlala yengadi yetroppiki. Bhuka ngokuqondile ngamanani angcono kakhulu nesevisi eyindilinga.

chalet.heroTitle: Ukuzihlukanisa okuyisithandandaba • Ubuhle bendawo • Ukuthula kwe-tropical
chalet.heroDescription: Eficwe ekhoneni elizimele lendawo, i-Thatched Chalet inikeza indawo yokuhlala enokuthula, eyisithandandaba. Emthunzini wesundu, i-strelitzia, i-acacia, ama-fern, nemithi ye-Indian almond, ikugqilaza emvelweni ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa ukunethezeka noma ubumfihlo.

sections.heading: Izilungiselelo & Umoya
sections.description: I-chalet enophahla lotshani, esekelwa izigodo eziqinile ze-bluegum, ikhipha ubuhle bendawo. Itafula le-autumn-slate lihlangana ngokuvumelana nezingqingo zalo ezinomutha, kuyilapho izindonga ezifakiwe udayi lwe-wheatfield zidala umoya wangaphakathi ofudumele nokuthulile.

sections.heading: Itherrasi & Ingadi
sections.description: Nyuka i-therrassi yakho eyimfihlo, egcwele izitulo ezigingqiwe zamaqabunga esundu netafula lokudlela ngezitulo. Khulula emthunzini we-canopy yengadi futhi ujabulele izibonakaliso nomoya wemvelo.

sections.heading: Ingaphakathi & Ukunethezeka
sections.description: Ngaphakathi, amabheda amabili abodwa anezisekelo angahlanganiswa abe yibheda elikhulu le-King-size ukusetha okunethekisayo kokubili. I-air conditioner iqinisekisa ukunethezeka konyaka wonke, kuyilapho ukukhanya okumnene kuhlanganisa ukuhlobisa kwendawo.

sections.heading: Igumbi Lokugezela Elingasese
sections.description: I-chalet ihlanganisa igumbi lokugezela elizimele eline-shower, indlu yangasese, ne-sink, lihlanganisa ulula nobuhle bendawo bezilungiselelo zalo zemvelo.

sections.heading: Isipiliyoni
sections.description: Kungabe ufuna indlela yothando noma ukubalekela okunokuthula, leli chalet elincane linezisa inhlanganisela engakhohleki yokuzihlukanisa, ubuhle, nokunethezeka—indawo yokuhlala efanele ngaphakathi kwe-paradise yetroppiki ye-DEVOCEAN.

cta.heading: Ukulungele Ukubhuka I-Chalet Yakho Eneqabunga?
cta.description: Balekela ekuzihlukaniseni okuyisithandandaba endaweni yethu yokucasha yetroppiki. Bhuka ngokuqondile ngamanani angcono kakhulu nesevisi eyindilinga.
